FuncDef:
The service restconf command creates the Service-Restconf view and displays it, or displays the Service-Restconf view that has been created.
The undo service restconf command deletes the Service-Restconf view and all configurations in this view. The service restconf command creates the Service-Restconf view and displays it, or displays the Service-Restconf view that has been created. The undo service restconf command deletes the Service-Restconf view and all configurations in this view. By default, the Service-Restconf view is not created.
